meanings: 대화 시작 What is it about?

vlive.korean: [용건만 간단히] 어디야? [Simple] Where are you? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [SKZ VLOG] 리노 : 리노, 하고 싶은 거 다 하지 마
휴닝카이! 용건이 뭐야? HUENINGKAI! What brought you here? 듣기 View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.05 - Part.3
우리를 보자고 한 용건은 무엇입니까? What is the reason you wanted to meet us? 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 7화 <궁궐애사 추리공방 Ⅰ>
vlive.english: What is the reason you wanted to meet us?

vlive.korean: 그중에 하나가 용건 없는 대화더라고요. One of them is talking without reasoning. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 여자친구 유주 편
vlive.english: One of them is talking without reasoning.

vlive.korean: [용건은 바로 축의금 미납!] 근데 제 결혼식에 축의금 왜 안 내셨어요? Why didn't you give a single penny for my wedding? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처3 EP28_ 가슴을 열어라2 - XX오빠~ 돈 내 놓으세요!!
vlive.english: Why didn't you give a single penny for my wedding?

examples.korean: Is there anything I can do for you? 발음듣기 저한테 무슨 용건이라도 있으세요? Neungyule
examples.english: Is there anything I can do for you? 발음

examples.korean: What I'm calling about is this ... 발음듣기 전화를 건 용건은 다름이 아니고, ... Neungyule
examples.english: What I'm calling about is this ... 발음

examples.korean: rattle a piece of business through 발음듣기 용건 하나를 잽싸게 해치우다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: rattle a piece of business through 발음

examples.korean: Please stay a moment for a matter of no moment 발음듣기 대단한 용건은 아니지만 잠깐 기다려 주십시오. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please stay a moment for a matter of no moment 발음

examples.korean: Yes, it is, how may I help you? 발음듣기 네, 맞습니다만, 무슨 용건이신가요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yes, it is, how may I help you? 발음
